title: ESG exclusive 'club' puts pressure on agriculture - AgUpdate
summary: The article discusses the increasing importance of Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) factors, ESG ratings, and their impacts on agriculture, particularly in relation to climate, environmental sustainability, and social justice.
green_innovation: FALSE. The article focuses on ESG ratings and their impacts on agriculture, which are related to social and environmental issues rather than on introducing new green innovations.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article does not specifically highlight a new or improved product or business process, but rather discusses the implications of ESG factors on the agriculture sector.
green_product: FALSE. While the article discusses environmental aspects related to agriculture practices and their assessment in the context of ESG ratings, it does not focus on the design or manufacturing characteristics of a specific product.
green_process: FALSE. The article touches on the assessment of environmental impacts related to agriculture practices under ESG ratings but does not primarily focus on methods or techniques optimized to reduce environmental impacts.

title: Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto Join Forces To Bring - CSRwire.com
summary: Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto partner to bring AI and autonomous drone technology to monitor and reduce emissions in the industrial sector.
green_innovation: TRUE. This partnership introduces cutting-edge AI and autonomous drone technology to help industrial customers monitor and reduce emissions, which contributes to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE. The collaboration between Koch Engineered Solutions and Percepto to offer AI software and autonomous drone solutions to industrial customers represents a new business process for monitoring and reducing emissions.
green_product: FALSE. The article does not focus on a specific product but rather on the partnership to provide AI and drone technology for emission monitoring in the industrial sector.
green_process: TRUE. The implementation of AI and autonomous drone technology to monitor and reduce emissions in the industrial sector aligns with green process principles by aiming to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability in operational activities.

title: Here's what won’t be included in Nassimi’s performance fabrics - Home Accents Today
summary: Nassimi, a textile manufacturer, has eradicated all PFAS chemicals from its new production, showcasing its commitment to environmental stewardship and human health while providing high-performance fabric alternatives.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is green innovation as Nassimi has eliminated PFAS chemicals from its production, contributing to environmental sustainability goals by reducing harmful substances and promoting a healthier environment.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as Nassimi has introduced a new production method that differs significantly from its previous processes, demonstrating a commitment to improving its products for the market.
green_product: TRUE. This is a green product as Nassimi's fabrics are designed to significantly reduce their environmental impact throughout their life cycle by eliminating PFAS chemicals and using sustainable production processes.
green_process: TRUE. This is a green process as Nassimi's manufacturing method minimizes environmental impacts by eradicating PFAS chemicals, reducing waste, conserving resources, and limiting harmful substance release.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 313310 - Textile and Fabric Finishing Mills, 313320 - Fabric Coating Mills, 313210 - Broadwoven Fabric Mills, and 313240 - Knit Fabric Mills
greenwashing: FALSE. This is not an example of greenwashing as Nassimi's actions to eliminate PFAS chemicals are genuine and in line with their commitment to sustainable manufacturing.

title: MSD Animal Health set to launch revamped platform to predict poultry health, prevent disease and improve performance - FeedNavigator.com
summary: MSD Animal Health is introducing SenseHub Poultry, an innovative technology for continuous monitoring and analysis of poultry health and environmental indicators in poultry barns, empowering farmers to predict health and well-being trends for their flocks and take immediate action for optimal outcomes.
green_innovation: TRUE. This innovation aligns with green innovation principles by enhancing animal well-being, promoting sustainability in poultry farming, and contributing to more efficient operations through technology-driven health monitoring.
business_innovation: TRUE. The introduction of SenseHub Poultry by MSD Animal Health represents a business innovation as it involves the launch of a new technology-driven product that significantly differs from the firm's previous offerings, targeting improved health outcomes and operational efficiency in poultry farming.
green_product: TRUE. SenseHub Poultry can be categorized as a green product as it is designed to significantly reduce environmental impacts by promoting sustainable poultry farming practices, enhancing animal health and well-being, and providing tools for efficient resource management throughout the flock's life cycle.
green_process: TRUE. The implementation of SenseHub Poultry's monitoring technology can be classified as a green process in poultry farming, as it utilizes wireless sensors to minimize environmental impacts, reduce waste, conserve resources, and enable real-time monitoring for sustainable operations.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325412 - Pharmaceutical Preparation Manufacturing, 541690 - Other Scientific and Technical Consulting Services, 541710 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 112340 - Poultry Hatcheries
greenwashing: FALSE. The article text does not indicate any false or misleading environmental claims about SenseHub Poultry, presenting a genuine focus on improving poultry health and environmental monitoring.
